title: Family-Friendly Riverfront Home in Swidnica Historic Center – Perfect for Student Life
description: Welcome to your charming new home in the heart of Swidnica’s Historic Center! This inviting house offers 3 bright bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms within an open floor plan spread across 165 sqm. Enjoy cozy evenings around the fireplace and long days filled with sunlight thanks to modern solar panels. With plenty of room to study, relax, and entertain, pets are warmly welcomed here.
neighborhood_description: Step out into a lively, well-connected neighborhood bustling with the city’s vibrant energy. The Historic Center is adored for its picturesque surroundings, excellent dining and shopping nearby, and convenient access to public transport and highways. Enjoy the beauty of the nearby waterfront; perfect for a relaxing break away from the books.
lifestyle_benefits: close to universities and cultural sites
walkable to waterfront and city events
great for group studies and gatherings
target_buyer: Students seeking a comfortable, well-equipped home in a central urban setting—ideal for sharing with friends—or families who value proximity to education, city life, and green recreation.
market_positioning: Positioned as one of the Historic Center’s most student-friendly family homes, offering a unique combination of character, sustainability, and space in a booming well-connected urban area.
